title: Laura Mvula Album font or similar
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/laura-mvula-album-cover_6730.jpg)

does anyone know what this font is? Or can you suggest something similar that's not too expensive or ideally free! Laura Mvula is a UK singer, I love the font to use for my bridal business x

Ryuk solved this and the font is Archer

Font: 

 Archer 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055638/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: stephiefont

comments.content: thank you so much! I think that's the one, a little out of my price range for now but i've gone with St Marie as a free alternative and will purchase this one once I have the budget as it's just the perfect balance of formal and elegant with a whimsical feel that I wanted... nowhere has a slab serif with the round ball S's that Arhcer has :( xx
